name: Temple Runner (Patrice Metcalf-Putnam, influffity)
description:
*For Mac users, download through the Itch app! Best experience will be to download, but if playing on browser, Chrome is your best bet (though browser build likely won't work on Mac regardless)

Do you find yourself wondering why there aren't more religions with hat-forward advancement opportunities? Do you like the idea of following the whims of a capricious god? Do we have the game for you!

In this game, run a temple and sort offering from hat-crazed acolytes. Careful! They'll do anything to get one of those sweet, sweet hats.

Alvin Raj - Coding and Technical Art

Patrice Metcalf-Putnam - Coding and Writing (and any of the ugly art)

Raventrapta - Art

MSutherlandComp: Composer

Katherine Tole: Voice Acting

Stephen Roe: Voice Acting

Additional resources:

Godot Dialogue Manager by Nathan Hood
